column4: i want to know where the programs get installed when i install them using apt-get install package-name
what is the equivlent of progrma files in ubuntu
in which folder does the package gets installed

there is none. while on Windows programs are divided into one directory for each program (generally), in Unix directories tend to contain specific kinds of files, *regardless* of the program they belong to
so, executable programs are mostly in /usr/bin, but their icons (for instance) can be in /usr/share
